title: I got an  s- and didn't recieve a chest , why??
body: I got an s- and didn't recieve a chest, i am sure that the chest was available

replies.body:
same here, its happening for a while already.
I met all conditions: own champion, didnt drop the box from it yet, get S rank, even did it several times with different champions, yet i couldnt drop ANY box for a while...

Was this an SR normals/ranked and have you not previously earned a chest on that champion?

Can you link me the match history link for this match?
